data.title: 5 Things to Know About Jan Hoffmann
data.meta_description: Get to know the skateboarder from Bremen, Germany
data.text:
Red Bull Local Hero Tour is taking place on the weekend of November 13-14 in Bahrain at the Aali Shopping Complex. As local skateboarders get ready to shred, get to know Jan Hoffmann who’s coming straight from Dubai to ride with the scene

1. Jan Hoffmann is a young skateboarder from Germany based in the UAE

2. Jan started skating at the age of 11 in 2007

3. He also produces videos about skateboarding and is a contributing editor to many publications

4. His career highlights also include feature interview in Monster MSM Skateboarding magazine

5. Jan splits his time between the summer in Bremen, Germany (where he’s from) and Dubai in winter for the ideal skate - and shorts – weather all year round.

To know more about Red Bull Local Hero Tour click here and be part of the conversation: #LocalHeroTourBH
